item.description:
Jan has agreed to host a potluck supper for October. Bring something delicious, meet new people and have fun! Directions will be sent out later. Jan lives in Nashua NH, not too far for most of us. Carpooling is possible too.
The address is 12 Ledgewood Drive, Nashua NH. Going north on rte 3(FE Everett Turnpike) from MA take exit 5. Go west on rte 111(West Hollis St.) toward Hollis NH. Ledgewood Drive is about 1/2 mile on the left. She lives in Unit 305. Jan is going to make lasagna. We need salad, ice, drinks, dessert, appetizer. You can email me with what you are bringing, kimen@msn.com or call 603-432-4271 or 603-505-6172. Wear a costume or just wear orange...See you there!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: October Potluck Supper
